SEARCH
Package controller

Class AppointmentManager

Object
AppointmentManager
public class AppointmentManager extends Object
The AppointmentManager class provides methods for scheduling, viewing, rescheduling, and canceling appointments, as well as handling appointment requests and recording outcomes.
Since:
2024-10-31
Version:
12.11
Author:
Eldon Lim Kai Jie

  • Constructor Details

    • AppointmentManager

      public AppointmentManager()
      Constructs an AppointmentManager instance.

  • Method Details

    • scheduleAppointment

      public static boolean scheduleAppointment(Doctor doctor, String date, int timeSlot)
      Schedules an appointment for a patient with a specified doctor on a given date and time slot.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor for the appointment
      date - the date of the appointment
      timeSlot - the time slot for the appointment
      Returns:
      true if the appointment was successfully scheduled; false if the doctor is unavailable

    • viewPatientScheduledAppointments

      public static boolean viewPatientScheduledAppointments(Patient patient)
      Displays all scheduled appointments for a given patient.
      Parameters:
      patient - the patient whose scheduled appointments will be displayed
      Returns:
      true if there are no scheduled appointments; false otherwise

    • rescheduleAppointment

      public static void rescheduleAppointment(Patient patient, String appointmentID, String date, int timeSlot)
      Reschedules an appointment for a patient with a new date and time slot. New appointment timing request sent to doctor for confirmation.
      Parameters:
      patient - the patient requesting the reschedule
      appointmentID - the ID of the appointment to be rescheduled
      date - the new date for the appointment
      timeSlot - the new time slot for the appointment

    • viewAppointmentDetail

      public static void viewAppointmentDetail(Appointment appointment, Role role)
      Displays the details of a given appointment based on the user's role.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the appointment to display
      role - the role of the viewer (Administrator, Doctor, or Patient)

    • cancelAppointment

      public static void cancelAppointment(Patient patient, String appointmentID)
      Cancels an appointment for a given patient by appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      patient - the patient whose appointment is to be canceled
      appointmentID - the ID of the appointment to be canceled

    • cancel_viewPatientScheduledAppointments

      public static void cancel_viewPatientScheduledAppointments(Patient patient)
      Displays all of a patient's upcoming appointments that are not canceled or completed.
      Parameters:
      patient - the patient whose upcoming appointments will be displayed

    • handleDoctorAppointmentRequest

      public static void handleDoctorAppointmentRequest(Doctor doctor)
      Handles pending appointment requests for a doctor, allowing them to accept or cancel each appointment.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor handling the appointment requests

    • getDoctorUpComingAppointments

      public static List<Appointment> getDoctorUpComingAppointments(Doctor doctor)
      Retrieves a list of all upcoming appointments for a doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor whose upcoming appointments will be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of the doctor's upcoming appointments

    • recordAppointmentOutcome

      public static void recordAppointmentOutcome(String appointmentID, Service service, String consultationNotes, String medicineName)
      Records the outcome of an appointment, including service details and consultation notes.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - the ID of the appointment for which to record the outcome
      service - the service provided during the appointment
      consultationNotes - notes recorded during the consultation
      medicineName - the name of the medicine prescribed

    • printAppointmentOutcome

      public static void printAppointmentOutcome(AppointmentOutcome appointmentOutcome)
      Prints the details of an appointment outcome.
      Parameters:
      appointmentOutcome - the outcome of the appointment to print
